ygData.subject: Re:  RE: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that was just downright rude.  The Necro didn t have to kill them to get a Faction increase, simply hit them with a level 1 Str Sapping DoT or something.
ygData.messageBody:
Now that was just downright rude. The Necro didn't have to kill them
to get a Faction increase, simply hit them with a level 1 Str Sapping
DoT or something. You get the kills and experience, he gets the
faction and uses a LOT less mana to do it.

Rosha Cristi, Bard
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk

--- In eqbards@onelist.com, John Tatsukawa <jht@b...> wrote:
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Harmonie Moonsong [mailto:harmoniemoonsong@...]
> > Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 5:50 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
> >
> >
> > From: Harmonie Moonsong <harmoniemoonsong@...>
> >
> > On the topic of playing nice,,, last night my almost
> > 17lvl enchanter was trying to kill gnolls in highpass
> > with a 19 druid for a partner. We were doing fine,
> > till this Lvl 50 Necro arrived and said... "sorry to
> > do this to you guys, but i need the faction" he then
> > proceeded to kill everything in site till i gave up
> > and left 30 minutes later. That is in reallity how
> > sharing works...
